sentences.cn: 租用的住处

sentences.en: Accommodation can be arranged at local bed and breakfasts.
sentences.cn: 住宿可以安排在当地提供住宿加次日早餐的家庭旅馆。

sentences.en: Accommodation is free — all you pay for is breakfast and dinner.
sentences.cn: 住宿免费——你只需付早餐和正餐的钱。

sentences.en: Accommodation is never fixed up in advance.
sentences.cn: 住宿从未提前安排好。

sentences.en: Accommodation was basic to say the least.
sentences.cn: 往轻里说是住宿条件简陋。

sentences.en: Are you looking for furnished accommodation?
sentences.cn: 你在找备有家具的出租房间 吗 ?

sentences.en: His instinct would be to seek a new accommodation with the nationalists.
sentences.cn: 他本能的反应会是寻求与民族主义者取得新的和解。

sentences.en: living accommodations for the crews
sentences.cn: 船员的起居舱

sentences.en: Many old people choose to live in sheltered accommodation.
sentences.cn: 许多老年人选择到养老院居住.

sentences.en: rented accommodation

sentences.en: secure accommodation for young offenders
sentences.cn: 严密看管的少年犯囚室

sentences.en: Skiing weekends cost £58 (exclusive of travel and accommodation).
sentences.cn: 周末滑雪价格为58英镑（不含交通和住宿费）。

sentences.en: Some ministers will have to hot-desk until more accommodation can be found.
sentences.cn: 一些部长将不得不轮用办公桌，直到能够找到更多的办公场所为止。

sentences.en: The accommodation for the press was makeshift at best.
sentences.cn: 迁就新闻界充其量只是个权宜之计.

sentences.en: The authority must make suitable accommodation available to the family.
sentences.cn: 当局必须给这个家庭提供适当的食宿条件。

sentences.en: The government will provide temporary accommodation for up to three thousand homeless people.
sentences.cn: 政府将为多达三千无家可归的人提供临时住所。

sentences.en: The price for the holiday includes flights and accommodation.
sentences.cn: 度假的价格包括机票和住宿。

sentences.en: The school occupies split-site accommodation on the main campus.
sentences.cn: 该学院分散在主校区不同地点。

sentences.en: to stay in high-class accommodation
sentences.cn: 住在上好的住所

sentences.en: travel and hotel accommodations
sentences.cn: 旅行及酒店住宿

sentences.en: Travel and overnight accommodation are included.
sentences.cn: 旅行与晚间的食宿包括在内。

sentences.en: Universities have to provide student accommodation for first-year students.
sentences.cn: 大学必须为一年级生提供学生宿舍。

sentences.en: You can upgrade from self-catering accommodation to a hotel.
sentences.cn: 您可以将自理膳食旅店升级为酒店。
